Description: Identified households receive food vouchers every month. Households will benefit from supplementary support, such as storytelling, tutoring of young children and helping the seniors with household chores. This will provide the opportunity for the children to advance in life. In addition, periodic reviews and assessments are carried out to monitor improvement or change in the family’s conditions, and to ensure that the dire needs of the families are met with the programme.
